channel.title: Veteran Web and iOS developer, now a free soul
channel.description: Veteran Web and iOS developer, now a free soul

item.title: On communication
item.description:
On communication

Being entrepreneur, aka being boss of your own, is certainly not conventional. For some, having a structured job and proper career path set out from beginning is clearly the right option. For me, paving my own path is the only choice I know ever since Iâ€™m aware that I need to do something about my life.
